title: DJT Stock Begins Trading as Trump Owns Majority of $8 Billion Media Company
summary: Trump Media begins trading under ticker DJT valued at $8 billion, making Trump's 58% stake worth more than all his real estate combined, creating unprecedented presidential conflict of interest

sources.title: Truth Social surges in DJT stock debut
DJT stock creates unique new ethical nightmare

notes: First time in history a presidential candidate owns publicly traded media company. Stock can be purchased by anyone including foreign governments. Creates direct path for influence buying.
